caseTitle: Dr. Pir Muhammad Khan v. Khuda Bakhsh and others
tagline: The principles of Muhammadan Law of pre-emption, which is the original source of statutory law on the subject, set out equally high standard for making talb-i-muwathibat and talb-i-ishhad, as prescribed under the statutory law. Two talbs were not made by the respondents in the required manner of vigilance and promptness. The suit of pre-emption filed by the respondents is dismissed.
